name: Cranberry-Jalapeno Dip
author: My Stir Crazy Kitchen
summary: If you're looking for the most festive party snack ever, this is it. The combination of cranberries, jalapeno, and just the right amount of sugar makes this dip a favorite for its looks and its taste! It's different, it's delicious, and it makes a gorgeous table addition. What's not to love? Refrigerate overnight for best flavor. Serve with tortilla chips.
ingredients: 6 medium fresh jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced
directions: Combine cranberries, jalapenos, and cilantro in the bowl of a food processor; pulse until blended, working in batches if necessary
Stir in sugar, lime juice, salt, and pepper
